nodes.text: Castle Panteer was the ancestral home of House Panteer, located in the Glarus Valley on Alderaan. After the death of Queen Silara Panteer and her son Gaul Panteer around 3653 BBY, House Ulgo's forces attacked the castle and set it ablaze, forcing House Panteer to retreat into a series of caves high in the mountains. The ruins of the castle were then occupied by the self-proclaimed king Bouris Ulgo and his forces.
